definitions.definition: To suffer, or cause someone to suffer, from severely reduced oxygen intake to the body.
definitions.example: Open the hatch, he is suffocating in the airlock!

definitions.definition: To die due to, or kill someone by means of, insufficient oxygen supply to the body.
definitions.example: He suffocated his wife by holding a pillow over her head.

definitions.definition: To overwhelm, or be overwhelmed (by a person or issue), as though with oxygen deprivation.
definitions.example: I'm suffocating under this huge workload.
